name: GetUserIdentityProviders
description:
Retrieve identity providers associated with a user in Okta.

Use this tool to fetch and list identity providers connected to a specified user in Okta. It helps in managing and understanding user-associated IdPs.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: An ID, login, or unambiguous login shortname of an existing Okta user to list associated identity providers.

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
